actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate with respect to the continued political independence, territorial integrity, and nonaligned status of Yugoslavia.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that, during the leadership transition in Yugoslavia, the President should: (1) make clear U.S. opposition to Soviet attempts to violate or subvert Yugoslav independence; and (2) encourage other governments to announce publicly their continued support for Yugoslav independence.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate with respect to the continued political independence, territorial integrity, and nonaligned status of Yugoslavia.
